response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to present our premium product, which holds significant value to both of us. Given its worth, I propose a special introductory offer of $7,500 for this exceptional item. This price reflects not only its intrinsic value but also my commitment to making it accessible while ensuring a fair profit for me. I believe this deal presents an excellent opportunity for both parties. Please let me know if you're interested in proceeding with this offer.", "product_price": 7500}
